text: Citroën Xsara was a car produced by Citroën from 1997 through 2005. An MPV version, the Xsara Picasso, was launched in 1999 and was produced until 2010. == Engines == * 1.4i 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.6i 65 kW (88 hp) * 1.6i 16V 80 kW (109 hp) * 1.8i 66 kW (90 hp) and 74 kW (101 hp) * 1.8i 16V 81 kW (110 hp) * 2.0i 16V 97 kW (132 hp) and 100 kW (136 hp) * 2.0i 16V VTS 120 kW (163 hp) * 1.4 HDi 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.9 D 51 kW (69 hp) * 1.9 SD 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.9 TD 66 kW (90 hp) * 2.0 HDi 66 kW (90 hp) and 80 kW (109 hp) Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Xsara
title: Citroën Xsara
